title: Aadhar Housing Finance, TVS Supply Chain Solutions, three others get Sebi’s nod to float IPOs - The Financial Express
content: Aadhar Housing Finance, TVS Supply Chain Solutions, three others get Sebi’s nod to float IPOs  The Financial Express
description: Apart from these, Bikaji Foods International and Kids Clinic India too have obtained the regulator's approval to float Initial Public Offerings (IPOs).
